thread.title: Uncertainty is the Watchword for Global Markets
thread.title_full: Uncertainty is the Watchword for Global Markets - WSJ

author: Richard Barley
title: Uncertainty is the Watchword for Global Markets
text:
Sometimes, investors are their own worst enemies. That certainly appears to have been the case in the third quarter of 2015, which many in markets will be glad to see the back of.
Of 42 major global financial assets tracked by Deutsche Bank across stocks, bonds, commodities and foreign exchange, only 12 eked out gains in local currency between July and September, with none returning more than 5%. Italian government bonds topped the list, gaining 4.1% in euro terms. The list of losers is long and daunting. The three... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
